General.Name: SilverSPAC Inc Unit
General.Description: SILVERspac Inc. does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to concentrate on identifying businesses that provide technology and innovation solutions to the real estate and financial services industries, as well as concentrate on identifying enterprise technology companies that sell into the real estate and financial services sectors. SILVERspac Inc. was incorporated in 2021 and is based in New York, New York.
General.Address: 7 World Trade Center, New York, NY, United States, 10007
